sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './contact.css' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' function Contact() { function sendEmail(e) { e.event.preventDefault(); // منع إعادة تحميل الصفحة بعد الضغط على زر الإرسال function sendEmail() { emailjs.send({ SecureToken: "3fec3265-5bd3-495f-a257-97c889cfa5b7", To: "mahmoud995boghdady@gmail.com", From: "mahmoud995boghdady@gmail.com", Subject: "Message From My Website", Body: "user_name: " + document.getElementById("user_name").value + "
Email: " + document.getElementById("user_email").value + "
user_phone: " + document.getElementById("user_phone").value + "
message: " + document.getElementById("message").value }).then(function(message) { document.getElementById("contact_message").innerHTML = "✔ Message sent successfully"; document.getElementById("contact__form").reset(); }) .then((response) => { console.log('SUCCESS!', response.status, response.text); document.getElementById('contact_message').innerHTML = '✔ Message sent successfully'; document.getElementById('contact__form').reset(); }) .catch((error) => { console.log('FAILED...', error); document.getElementById('contact_message').innerHTML = 'Failed to send message. Please try again.'; }); } return (

Get in Touch

Contact Me

Message

) } } export default Contact
